评论详情: I wanted to love this dress but the front panel is longer than the back and gives a strange maternity wear vibe for gals with short torsos. I’m 5’3 and liked the length and the pattern was lovely but didn’t find it flattering.

评论详情: The top is way too tight.
I liked it but it was too long for the event
I wore this dress to a fall wedding and it was perfect! Very comfortable and high quality! I also love all the colors in it! It is also bump friendly! Wearing a size small!

I purchased the XL after another brand of XXL didn’t fit me, and this one fits wonderful! I wear a size 14/16, and all the sizes an Amazon are so different it’s hard to tell what will fit. This dress is beautiful and I’m contemplating ordering other colors!
It's runs small fits too close for me
The dress is prettier than I expected. It is very comfortable and true to size. I get lots of compliments when I wear it!

I'm almost 3 months post partum, so i was looking for a dress that was flowy enough to make me comfortable and confident in in public. I got an XL, which felt comfortable in, but there was a weird stitch that hits at an odd spot around the hips. Also was more low cut than i would have liked. But the material is nice and the print is pretty. I got several compliments and felt pretty in it for the most part.

Dress was gorgeous, vivid colors and nice material. Has a good underlining and not see through. True to size, but the waist or high rib area actually, was very form fitting. It was a little uncomfortable and made me feel chubby, even though it did hide alot.
I bought this awesome retro dress.  All I can say is WOW!!!!  It’s absolutely beautiful!  The colors are bright and the material is soft.  I highly recommend this dress!

I bought this for my baptism in the early Spring, and received a ton of compliments. It fit TTS, and was perfect for the mild Spring weather! It has long sleeves that kept my arms warm, yet wasn't too stifling hot when it became hotter outside. It has a nice flow to the dress, and was easy to wear and move around in!
This dress was absolutely a mess. I did not like it, and I will never order nothing from them again.

This dress is not worth $50 by any means. It's totally see through and the built-in slip isn't completely solid if the sun is shining. The material is very thin all over. It's flattering in some ways, but not in others. It's flowy, but the seam across the belly dips down and makes the belly look bigger.  I am not thin, but this dress makes my mid-section look worse than it is. See the photo I attached. If it was $20, this review would be different because you get what you pay for. Again, not worth the price. Not super flattering. It's giving boho/witchy-on-a-budget, not $50 black dress for family photos or fancy dinner.
The colors and print are so vibrant and the dress is very flowy and flattering. The sizing is accurate and it is a great length.
Love this dress! I got the purple one. It runs a bit big. I'm usually a medium and the medium in this dress was a tad baggy on me. Other than that, great dress!

I bought these 2 years ago and LOVE them. So much so, I just ordered 3 more colors  Unfortunately, the new ones I just received at EIGHT INCHES shorter than the ones I bought 2 years ago  Why do they change it up?? I’m so bummed and idk if I will keep them or not
Wore this to my boyfriend’s work holiday party & received many compliments! It’s also super comfy. Great material!
Was inside out, no tags and smelt like old grandma

I love this beautiful dress! The color is vibrant and the material is nice; it’s a georgette material which is not too thin and not scratchy, not cheap looking just right for its cost. I wore this on my baby shower and got compliments! I was 31 weeks pregnant and still have plenty of room on this dress. Comfy and feeling Beautiful on it!

Probably great on a young very skinny girl.  But definitely didn't look great on me even though I am a small.  It definitely runs small. I have a small chest and I could barely fit in it. I returned it right away. Really wanted to love it.
Love this dress
This is a pretty dress. It can be worn to a casual or dressy event. Size is accurate.
I wore this to a wedding and I looked fabulous and was comfortable the entire evening!

This is a versatile dress that can be with in multiple seasons. Good quality of fabric and true to size. Love the neckline and waist. I liked this dress so much I bought a short one in the same style. Great flow to the material.
Very pretty dress and tons of compliments when I’ve worn it
Very pretty. Nice material , flow and design. Runs very large. I'm returning .
I liked the fit, comfort and pattern. It was exactly what I was wanting.

I loved wearing this dress! I got a medium and it fit wonderfully. I think I could have been a little heavier or even thinner and it would have fit just fine. It has a nice stretchy waist band. The shoulders dont have a lot of stretch but fit just fine. I am more broad shouldered but if you have a very wide or even muscly back and shoulders, you may want to size up. It was beautiful and flowy. Not see through at all because of the long slip underneath. I thought it could have been too warm, but ended up being just fine. We went to a wedding in mid October here in Texas. At least 80 degrees out during the wedding ceremony.

I wanted a slightly flowy and bright dress that was appropriate for church and winter time (in California) and this dress is perfect. It fits exactly as expected and is the perfect combo of dressy and causal. It’s comfortable and best of all not too long! I’m 5’2” and the dress comes all the way down to my feet but doesn’t drag on the ground so I can wear it with heels or flats! Great purchase.
I loved this dress. Purchased to wear to my daughters baby shower. Great fit, so comfortable and beautiful. I also ordered in other solid colors for another event. Perfect fall dress.
This dress is very well-made and accentuates all the right angles. So impressed!
Very beautiful dress. Exact same color as shown in the picture.

I really like this dress. I bought it for a wedding this winter. I wear a size 14 normally and I am busty 38D. The bust is definitely snug and it’s a bit low cut but overall fits fine and I am pleased.

I love this dress! I'm 5'4", 155 lbs, 38d. I got the size large and it fits perfectly! It is lined, no pockets. It us very comfortable and tglhe colors are as pictured. It is lightweight and pairs nicely with a faux suede jacket. Perfect fall dress pattern, I'm going to wear it to Thanksgiving. I'll order another one in the Spring with Spring colors but this one will be worn year round! Definitely recommend this dress!

评论概述: New Favorite Dress?! Almost! This One is Nice!
评论详情: My wife is a big fan of long dresses, and this one has checked all her boxes in a big way! The fabric is excellent quality, and the print is both beautiful and high-contrast. All around, it’s a stunning dress.  She generally prefers looser-fitting styles and noted that this one is a bit snug, but it still fits her well. Personally, I think it’s one of the best-fitting dresses in her closet. From a quality standpoint, I have been unable to find a single thread out of place or any other manufacturing defect across the entire garment.  Between the gorgeous design and the impressive build quality, my wife has said this is one of her new favorites—and I don't blame her. That’s high praise, as she owns some very, very nice dresses!  All in all, this dress exudes quality and is well worth the price. I could absolutely see it being offered at a high-end boutique for much more. Highly recommended!
I’m not really into flowers , but the dress is flattering and it’s a lovely autumn print 🙂 I’m 165 pounds 5”4 and M fit well.

I ordered this dress for an event.  Unfortunately, it was not for me.  My body type did not work or look good in the garment.  I am giving it a 5 star rating because it was as described and would look great on someone else.  I did have to return it and that was done with ease.

This dress is beautiful, however once I opened my package you could definitely tell it was worn and not new. The dress wasn’t even folded it was rolled into a ball. I sent it back for a replacement. I just received my second package today and this package smells like perfume. What are the odds of receiving two different orders and both dresses clearly have already been worn. What a disappointment. Once again, I’m returning it.
I absolutely love this dress perfect for any event..fits me to a tee ..soo many compliments

I purchased this for a fall wedding and it was so pretty. I’m sure it could also be used for early spring as well. The fit was great for me (5’4, 128 lbs.) and wrinkles steamed out easily. If you’re on the fence, just get it! I loved wearing it!
Fit perfectly and sooo cute! Also super comfortable. I wore to a friend’s wedding and got so many compliments!
The dress was used and had a horrible smell, I returned it, and it was difficult to get my refund, I do not recommend it, the fabric was of poor quality, and the finish was terrible.
I really love this dress.

These dresses are gorgeous a little disappointing that the colors are not as bright as the pictures. The only thing I hate is the poofy sleeve at the shoulder that makes it look frumpy. Otherwise they're absolutely beautiful.I had to get an xl which fit perfect.These are not flowy unless you size up. The chest fit much better in the large than extra large but then the hips were tight which is ridiculous because they show it super flowy which is not true at all it hangs pretty straight. Also I get warm very easily in the long sleeves will make me way too hot I like the short sleeve ones I just wish the shoulders weren't so puffy. Also they come a wrinkled mess and washing them does not get the wrinkles out you have to steam the dress to get the wrinkles out.
Dress run small. I used the sizing chart and it was too small, but it would probably look amazing on a small framed shorter person.
Really liked the color and styling of this dress, however was too small so had to return the item.
Says exactly what it is. Fits great. Great quality. Very comfortable dress
Cheap material. Inaccurate sizing.
Beautiful dress but not true to size at all. Buy 2 sizes up.
This dress would have been perfect but it’s juuusst slightly too tight in the bust area. So gorgeous, I could probably do fine with a size up
It wasn’t terrible looking. But it was just ok. And I’d prefer pockets. I’m in between sizes so I ordered 2. Neither were very flattering

评论概述: Design not at all like the photo
评论详情: I ordered the rose patterned dress but got something else.  I don't hate it but it wasn't quite what I thought it would be.  It isn't stretchy - just like they tell you, so make sure to use the chart provided to determine what size you are.  I found it easy to wash and dry.  You can also hang it to dry and that works fine too.  It's reasonably lightweight so it's good for fall or spring.  I'll wear it but I am disappointed that it wasn't as advertised in the picture.

I had to have a dress for a spring wedding rehearsal dinner and wow was this one a hit!  It is even more beautiful in person than in pictures and I got so many compliments. This dress runs true to size, I am 5’4 and around 135 and I got this in medium. I can honestly say yes to the dress!!
Nice dress
I’m only 5’3 and this dress hit above my ankles. It was shapeless, the seams hit in allll the wrong places, and the color wasn’t as shown.
I received compliments everywhere I went in this dress. Perfect fit

评论概述: Very Pretty and Perfect for the Occasion
评论详情: I went to a celebration of life and they asked us not to wear black. I didn't feel comfortable wearing anything too bright and I felt this was a nice compromise. It's pretty and floral and a nice subdued color. I also took it on a cruise and wore it to dinner a few times. I tend to be cold and this felt warm. I didn't need a sweater like I normally do. I wouldn't wear it outside on a hot day.

This long maxi dress looks sweet and lovely. The fabric is delicate and lightweight, best suited for spring or fall. I like the big blue flower motif, it looks fresh and feminine without being over the top. I used a garment steamer to get the initial creases out and since then it is nicely wrinkle resistant, just the way polyester should be. This is a great dress for situations where you simply can't afford to have a crumpled cotton look and a presentable and tidy appearance is a must. It appears to be true to size and washes without any issues in the washing machine.

评论概述: IS IT ME ... OR THE DRESS???
评论详情: Had high hopes for this dress for an upcoming wedding.  Received today.  I ordered an XL as suggested.  The top shows way more of the girls than I'm used to and there is a weird "pouch" of material above the first gather ... looks like I'm carrying a whole lot of weight in my mid-section ... and I'm not really!  The material itself is really very nice.  I ordered the black with pink flowers.  Really very pretty but not for me.

评论概述: Nice dress at a nice price!
评论详情: This was an 'emergency' buy for a coastal beach wedding. I honestly was not looking to spend a lot of money for a dress under this circumstance but I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this dress for the price paid. The colors on the dress were exactly as shown on the listing. Most importantly is the fit: I ordered my regular dress size and this fit perfectly. I am 5'7" and the dress length brushes the top of my foot, which may be too long if you are looking for a true 'midi' and not a 'maxi' length. The bodice is actually cut very nicely and is flattering and modest. The high cut empire waistline is a great trick to conceal a bit of 'tummy'. Overall, this dress is a great buy and you won't be disappointed.
I sent this back as it was a bit too small but it is beautiful, needed more of a waist line
Very Beautiful but the breast area was extremely small. No stretch.
It a beautiful dress, love color and material.  hate it didn't come larger.

Dress itself is cute, and the material feels nice, however, I am fairly large busted and this was way too small in the chest area and there's no stretch to the seam under and around the bust. The dress fit otherwise, but I could not fit the ta-tas in there. I really wish it fit. For reference, I'm 5ft, 145lbs and wear a 38h.
Dress does not fit well.

评论概述: Not for those who are busty.
评论详情: Ordered a small, 5'1" and125 lbs. Measured before buying. The fit is odd. How the dress is cut and sewn around the bust makes for a very awkward bust shape. The elastic band around the under bust has plenty of room, but going up a size would make the dress too big for me. As well as the inside lining is like plastic and very uncomfortable. The color in the photo isn't exact. Take caution when purchasing.

Perfect for church or going out.  This dress is comfortable and true to size.  The flowy material is form-fitting enough to accentuate my curves, while hiding my flaws.  Modest, but sexy and feminine, a great dress!
My wife got this and I highly recommend it for your wife. Highly!!!

Do you need an adorable Fall dress? If yes, this one is for you. The pattern is so cute. The orange is just perfect. The neckline and waist are super flattering. The only negative to this dress, the fabric is 100% poly. I get that for the price, but a blend is just so much better. The dress overall is so cute that I still love it. I just wish the fabric was a blend.

I’m 5’10, 165 pounds, 36 C chest. This dress fit to perfection! The perfect vneck dress that keeps you completely covered and makes you feel oh so feminine! The length was around my ankles, the fabric of the dress was not itchy, it hid all the problem areas, and it was just warm enough for the cooler weather coming in. I have worn it to church and a bridal tea and I was complimented all day on how gorgeous the dress was at both! Would definitely recommend, especially for the tall girls.

Go a size up if your curvier like me with bigger arms because the fabric does not stretch but because I went a size up it became bigger on my chest, so I had to wear a tank top under it but overall, it's a beautiful long flowy dress.

This dress is beautiful and has gotten so many compliments! The first picture I was not pregnant and the second I was about 33 weeks pregnant. I ordered a large and was about 160lbs prior to pregnancy!
Super cute but There’s no give in the chest area make sure the girls have enough room. I ordered size large and wear a D38 bra and needed a lot more room.

I like this dress a lot! The cut is very flattering. I like the design of the waist and the ruffles at the sleeves are a lovely feminine touch. The blue flowers are pretty, but seem a little off, like you can tell it's a cheaper print. I'm a women's 14 and a DD and the XL fits well.
Quality not what we expected

I am always hesitant to get the long sleeve longer dresses. I worry that it won’t be flattering. This dress is actually very cute. It accentuates the waist nicely. This would be a cute dress to wear to a baby shower or another celebration. I am 5’7”, and got the medium. It fits perfectly.
I love this material, it’s a very nice soft flowing chiffon. The dress is flattering. And the floral print is pretty. It fits true to size.
Nice print. Flowy fabric. Pretty dress.
Small

This dress matched true to the photos in terms of design. But unless you are rail thin (similar to the model) this dress will do you no favors. Firstly, there is absolutely no stretch in the fabric nor the seams. Medium did fit me (5'5", 135lb, 34G), but it was not flattering in any way. The chest was pulled tight, and the wide middle band at the waist made the dress look... religious? LOL. Then the skirt puffed out, and made my hips look wider than they are. 4/5 stars. This dress is indeed cute, but I'd recommend for very thin women.
This dress is very flattering for a large bust.  It fits so good and looks very pretty.  Nice material.

This dress is so soft and flows nicely, it has a very silky feel to it. It fits very well and true to size, it has a very nice flow to it when you are wearing it and will move with the slightest of breeze. I love how it has long sleeves even though they are a little short on me. The dress is very light and is a very nice dress for a summer outing like a picnic or a beach date. While the dress is a light color it has a built in liner and makes it so that it can be worn without having to worry about people seeing things that they shouldn't. I love this dress and would recommend it to anyone that is interested in it.
Dress looks exactly as shown. Fit to size. Was too long for me but I’m 5’3. That was the only alteration I had to make  Have received multiple compliments each time I wear it.
I wore this as my Easter dress this year. I was very pleased with it and felt very confident wearing it. Got lots of compliments!
Flowered women’s dress with ruffles on the shoulders and a side slit. It is lined underneath and seems to be made well. It is pretty long and the skirt is full. Great for a more dressy fall occasion.

While the dress looks light it is actually very heavy. Also if you are returning like I did it takes a good 6 weeks before you get a refund! Think about it before you buy! I had high hopes for this dress but was very disappointed
Great dress, looks great right out of the package and the fit is perfect.  I needed a dress to wear to a country wedding and this dress is perfect.
Cute dress. Perfect for fall events. Feels fun and fresh
The dress is everything I expected and more. Comfortable,colorful and fits my curves just right! Love it!! Bought an X large!
